Text: Is this the new version that was re-released or the old one that leaked?

OK dumb question how do I get this thing to work ?

Start daupdater in the bin_ship directory in the dragon age install directory.
Select and install the dazip's in this torrent.
Run decrypt_all
Modify in my documents/bioware/dragon age/settings/AddIns.xml RequiresAuthorization="1" to RequiresAuthorization="0" for return to ostagar.
Where is this decrypt_all I can't find it....it is driving me crazy....

thx man works perfect,
and this is the new version of ostagar
This version will install the DLC into your computer, but the DLC will still be "unauthorized". the .exe file attached doens't seem to fix anything either =/
dont think this one is the best choice right now, unless we have more clarification

READ THE INSTRUCTIONS BLOCKME
Instructions by Neverwinterx
Start daupdater in the bin_ship directory in the dragon age install directory.
Select and install the dazip's in this torrent.
Run decrypt_all

Modify in my documents/bioware/dragon age/settings/AddIns.xml RequiresAuthorization="1" to RequiresAuthorization="0" for return to ostagar.

@AdkEric
The dedaodrm.exe runs the .bat key 45125944 and search for your crypted DLC and decrypt it
